title: Black screen at champ select
body: Whenever I get into a match it black screens in the draft, this is really frustrating as it makes me unable to ban and kicks me out of the game. I really don't want get banned or get blocked from the queue because of something I can't control.

replies.body:
Try repairing your client, if that doesn't work, try reinstalling your game. Sounds like a corrupt install to me.

If that fails read through this post:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/vegkZzOx
